H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7186.def: = state in which an object is firm and stable in shape

H2389.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H6485.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe a person, group, or object ► with the purpose of determining their well-being, condition, and/or integrity

H3882.def: = large mythical monster living in the sea and looking like a giant croccodile or similar reptile

H1281.def: = pertaining to the ability to move away quickly from dangerous location

H5175.def: = long legless reptile without eyelids or external ears; it moves by wriggling or gliding; some species have a poisonous bite; ≈ symbol of lurking, unexpected danger; associated with lies, deception, and misleading teaching

H6129.def: = action of moving forward in a wavy motion (said of snakes)

H2026.def: = causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8577.def: = mythical sea monster, such as {L:behemoth<SDBH:בְּהֵמֹות>} and {L:leviathan<SDBH:לִוְיָתָן>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H2531.def: = state in which objects have such a high quality ► that they provoke in others the desire to possess them

H3754.def: = field where {L:grapes<SDBH:עֲנָב>} are cultivated, growing on {L:vines<SDBH:גֶּפֶן>}; typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a {L:watchtower<SDBH:מִגְדָּל>} and a {L:wine press<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5341.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H8248.def: = state in which objects contain a certain amount of moisture

H7281.def: = a very short length of time

H3915.def: = the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6485.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe a person, group, or object ► with the purpose of determining their well-being, condition, and/or integrity

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H2534.def: = poisonous fluid; ◄ secreted by serpents, scorpions, etc. and introduced into body of victim by bite or sting; ► used by these animals to kill their prey and/or defend themselves against their natural enemies; ≈ often used to denote suffering and injury in a more general sense as well

H7898.def: = small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction

H8068.def: = a legendary rock or mineral, known for its hardness; ≈ associated with an inflexible mind

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H6702.def: = causative action by which deities set fire to plants

H176.def: = particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H4581.def: = large fortification; for the defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; ≈ associated with protection and security and often used as an epithet for God

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6692.def: = process by which a plant produces flowers in the spring as a precursor to the plant's fruit; ≈ associated with strength, prosperity, and splendor

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H8398.def: primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans

H4347.def: = area of physical damage on the body; ◄ caused by an act of aggression

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H2026.def: = causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

H2027.def: = the killing of people in a cruel and violent way

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H7378.def: = action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way

H1898.def: = causative action by which humans causes other humans or objects to be removed from their place,◄ as if by blowing them away

H7186.def: = state in which an object is firm and stable in shape

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H5771.def: = a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment

H3722.def: = causative action by which humans cover objects with a coating of a certain substance

H6529.def: = produce from crop-bearing trees and plants

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H68.def: = hard, heavy, and strong substance, ◄ very commonly found in nature,  ► which can be hewn into different shapes by a craftsman

H1615.def: = a white soft earthy limestone, formed from the skeletal remains of sea creatures

H842.def: = female deity; ► worshiped by Canaanites, and symbolized with a wooden pole

H2553.def: = construction with a flat top; ◄ probably made out of stone; ► used for burning incense; ≈ associated with non-sanctioned worship

H1219.def: = action by which someone picks or harvests grapes from vines

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H910.def: = the state of being apart from significant others

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H5800.def: = action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place

H5695.def: = male young of a {L:cow<SDBH:פָּרָה>}; ► used as a symbol for a deity; also used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with being willful and untrained

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H3615.def: = process by which an activity comes to full completion

H3001.def: = process by which objects containing liquid essential to their existence lose these liquids ◄ due to some external or internal cause

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H215.def: = process by which something reflects light; ≈ associated with well-being

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H998.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H7355.def: = state in which humans feel affection for others

H2603.def: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H2251.def: = action by which humans strike another object repeatedly + with a stick or a similar wooden instrument, ► so that items attached to this object will be released

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H5158.def: = a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3950.def: = causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H7782.def: = a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H804.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of Assyria

H5080.def: = state in which one's hand, which holds an instrument like an axe, is raised ► with the purpose of striking it against another object

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H7812.def: = to lay oneself down on the ground ► as a sign of submission

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom
